about_the_game:
This 50 item pack contains equipment that is perfect for all the styles of fishing available in game and will help you combat any situation you may face! With a brand new boat, rods, reels, lures and clothing there really is everything to set up your perfect in-game tackle box.
Brand new partners are featured including a top of the range 625 bass boat from Blazer and Phenon + Ippon ranges of rods and reels from Enigma. For carp anglers, Trakker are featured for the first time with their new Propel rods.

Also included in this equipment pack is:

  • Further lures from Booyah and Yum as well as the new Ned Bomb from Missile Baits
  • Baitshack spinner lures that are great for trout and salmon
  • Further baits from CR Baits including a new range – Nu-Trine
  • The Xtractor rod and reel from Sonik Sports
  • Four new boat wraps from Fitzgerald, 13Fishing, Booyah and Yum
  • Brand new apparel from Wofte as well as exclusive Pro Tour clothing
detailed_description:
This 50 item pack contains equipment that is perfect for all the styles of fishing available in game and will help you combat any situation you may face! With a brand new boat, rods, reels, lures and clothing there really is everything to set up your perfect in-game tackle box.
Brand new partners are featured including a top of the range 625 bass boat from Blazer and Phenon + Ippon ranges of rods and reels from Enigma. For carp anglers, Trakker are featured for the first time with their new Propel rods.

Also included in this equipment pack is:

  • Further lures from Booyah and Yum as well as the new Ned Bomb from Missile Baits
  • Baitshack spinner lures that are great for trout and salmon
  • Further baits from CR Baits including a new range – Nu-Trine
  • The Xtractor rod and reel from Sonik Sports
  • Four new boat wraps from Fitzgerald, 13Fishing, Booyah and Yum
  • Brand new apparel from Wofte as well as exclusive Pro Tour clothing

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 64bit / 8 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-Core 3.5 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 750 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
